contact.address: 581 Lancaster Dr SE #293, Salem, OR 97317, USA

hero.headline: Transform Your Home's First Impression
hero.subhead: Expert curb appeal solutions that boost value and create lasting beauty.

features.title: Exterior House Washing
features.description: Remove dirt, grime, and mold with our gentle yet effective pressure washing techniques. Restore your home's beauty without damaging surfaces.

features.title: Driveway & Patio Cleaning
features.description: Say goodbye to oil stains, algae, and discoloration. We'll revitalize your driveways and patios, making them look like new.

features.title: Deck Restoration
features.description: Bring your deck back to life.  We clean, stain, and seal decks to protect them from the elements and enhance their natural beauty.

reviews.name: Sarah M.
reviews.text: Curb Appeal Specialist did an amazing job! My house looks brand new. Professional, on time, and exceeded my expectations.

reviews.name: John B.
reviews.text: Excellent service!  My driveway was covered in oil stains, and they were able to remove them completely. Highly recommend!
